channel.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.bannerfans.com][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/5027/110654390427.jpg[/img][/URL]
[u][b]CREDITS[/b][/u] 30% to Bashar for his source\client 70% to me for editing/adding new items
[b][size=18pt]HERE WE GOOO[/size][/b]
Client [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Client.png[/img]
Login Welcome Screen [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Welcomescreen.png[/img]
Commands, Didnt get to editing them yet.. [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/commandsdidntedityet.png[/img]
Minigame Teleports [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/minigames1.png[/img]
Minigame Teleports 2 [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Coolteleports.png[/img]
Godwars Teleport Interface(Props to Bashar) [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Godwarsnoneedforkillcount.png[/img]
New Teleport GFX Just Like RuneScape! [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/newteleporteinterface.png[/img]
Jad has [b]63 WAVES[/b] I was going to add jad here to make it easier but most likely [u][b]NOT[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/jadallwavesmightaddheretomakeiteasier.png[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Shops.png[/img]
Other Shops, Agility is west... [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Othershops.png[/img]
Ok this agility area is a bit tricky, you have to go on your client, click [b]"File"[/b], then [b]"Cleint detail"[/b] then type [b]"low"[/b] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Agilityareaproblygunnamakeeasiestskill.png[/img]
Combat level is colored(might change) [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Newcombatcolorsproblygunnachange.png[/img]
New max skill level[b](135)[/b] New max combat level[b](172)[/b] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/NEwmaxlevelandcombat.png[/img]
[u]ADDED A NEW MOLE BOSS DROPS BARRELCHEST ANCHOR VERY HARD TO KILL, BREATHES FIRE AND CAN MAX ABOUT 35s!![/u] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Moleboss.png[/img]
[u][b]NEW ITEMS I HAVE ADDED[/b][/u] [u] BARRELCHEST ANCHOR HUGE VERSION(I want to make it smaller but not to small so it can fit into a persons hand..)[/u] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/Addedbiganchoridkifikeeporfix.png[/img]
[u]Chaotic Maul[/u] [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz315/Empsman/My%20new%20server/addedchaoticmaulneedtofix.png[/img]
[b][u]Stuff i am going to work on...[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Add more items(currently trying to add elite treasure trail items from runescape)[/li] [li]Edit the commands more...[/li] [li]Get a Forums website[/li] [li]Edit shops/add more[/li] [li]Make a new area in wilderness where you kill shades and they drop phats[/li] [li]Add the server to google toplist[/li] [li]Add some customs[/li] [li]Deciding whether to take off donating or not(i never used so i dont really understand)[/li] [li]And do whatever i can to make the server more fun![/li] [li]Also fix the huge anchor+chaotic maul[/li][/ul]
Thanks for looking at my progress, if you have any ideas or anything you want to tell me feel free to let me know. Thanks again everyone! And btw I just started this server about 3 days ago so its not that great :\.
[i]TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK OF IT TOO ;D[/i]
--- OWNER JOSH

2. Do not add commands for players. the only people that should have elevated privileges, are those with elevated privileges.
3. Have you seen the size of the BCA model… Shrink.
4. Max skill 99.
5. Induce cyber vomiting… Now…[/quote]

item.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Anyone is is coming in here with destructive criticism can stfu and gtfo. Personally i thoght the giant anchor was funnier than fuck. I do agree that you should lower the 135 to 99, but i like the pk planet base eand i think that if you work at it a little more than it could be pretty big. If you havent figured out how to fix the theiving problem on the pkplanet source let me know.

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_R_Legit wrote:

Don’t mind m.dog, I lol’d at his comment. Right now this looks pretty bad i mean the huge barrelchest anchor? WtF? Other then that and what the client looks like, Terrible right now, hopefully it will get better.

EDIT: And change the max level back to 99, 135 is annoying.

item.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
item.dc:creator: @TehpureOwner TehpureOwner
item.description:
@TehpureOwner wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:9, topic:354083”]Please, drop this server off the face of the internet. Drop your computer off the face of the earth, then find something you’re good at… for something to come out as bad as this server you have to be extremely bad compared to most mscpers… do please, give up before you fuck something else up…

Natey, shut the fuck up… you’ve driven the joke into the ground, cut its head off, and you continue to beat the fuck out of it.

I cleaned all the “cyber vomit” up for you. The next person who spams this topic is getting muted.[/quote]

thanks for the cyber vomited cleaning, but like i said i just started it and its not even done, if you haven’t notice this is the server develpoment section where you share what youve developed so far so everyone stfu

Read full topic

item.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I honestly can’t say I like this.

The anchor is ugly.
The maul isen’t 1 handed.
The maul isen’t correctly held.
It is very basic.

item.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
item.dc:creator: @Valance Valance
item.description:
@Valance wrote:

Ohh where to begin. Well, I’ll give you some Constructive Criticism…

Overall it doesn’t look like the worst I’ve ever seen… I don’t like the login interface and the customs look crappy. I don’t like the stats going up to 135 (anything past 99 isn’t good in my opinion, also a reason why I don’t like the “new” RuneScape “skill” dungeoneering)

Generally I don’t think it’s worth continuing and I don’t really see it becoming a popular Server.

Read full topic

item.title: .::+~+MaulersWorld V1+~+::
item.dc:creator: @TehpureOwner TehpureOwner
item.description:
@TehpureOwner wrote:

CREDITS
30% to Bashar for his source\client
70% to me for editing/adding new items

[size=18pt]HERE WE GOOO[/size]

Client

Client.png765×503

Login Welcome Screen

Welcomescreen.png765×503

Commands, Didnt get to editing them yet…

commandsdidntedityet.png765×503

Minigame Teleports

Minigame Teleports 2

Godwars Teleport Interface(Props to Bashar)

New Teleport GFX Just Like RuneScape!

Jad has 63 WAVES I was going to add jad here to make it easier but most likely NOT

jadallwavesmightaddheretomakeiteasier.png765×503

Shops

Shops.png765×503

Other Shops, Agility is west…

Othershops.png765×503

Ok this agility area is a bit tricky, you have to go on your client, click “File”, then “Cleint detail” then type “low”

Agilityareaproblygunnamakeeasiestskill.png765×503

Combat level is colored(might change)

New max skill levelb[/b] New max combat levelb[/b]

ADDED A NEW MOLE BOSS DROPS BARRELCHEST ANCHOR VERY HARD TO KILL, BREATHES FIRE AND CAN MAX ABOUT 35s!!

Moleboss.png765×503

NEW ITEMS I HAVE ADDED

BARRELCHEST ANCHOR HUGE VERSION(I want to make it smaller but not to small so it can fit into a persons hand…)

Addedbiganchoridkifikeeporfix.png765×503

Chaotic Maul

Stuff i am going to work on…

[ul][li]Add more items(currently trying to add elite treasure trail items from runescape)[/li]
[li]Edit the commands more…[/li]
[li]Get a Forums website[/li]
[li]Edit shops/add more[/li]
[li]Make a new area in wilderness where you kill shades and they drop phats[/li]
[li]Add the server to google toplist[/li]
[li]Add some customs[/li]
[li]Deciding whether to take off donating or not(i never used so i dont really understand)[/li]
[li]And do whatever i can to make the server more fun![/li]
[li]Also fix the huge anchor+chaotic maul[/li][/ul]

Thanks for looking at my progress, if you have any ideas or anything you want to tell me feel free to let me know. Thanks again everyone! And btw I just started this server about 3 days ago so its not that great :.

TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK OF IT TOO ;D

— OWNER JOSH
